Akosshir.name: Akosshir
description: @+Akosshir+@ is one of two civilizations on the Amber Moon of Idrothea. The Akosshiri people are the favored civilization of Tiamat and, like their sister civilization of Vexthal, have a population exclusively comprised of dragonborn.

Vexthal.name: Vexthal
description: @+Vexthal+@ is one of two civilizations on the Amber Moon of Idrothea. The Vexthalin people are the favored civilization of Bahamut and, like their sister civilization of Akosshir, have a population exclusively comprised of dragonborn. The Vexthal are a highly structured, caste-based society with the ruling caste comprised of warriors dedicated to the Guardian, known as the Ajagar.
